thread.title: DeVos Slammed For Calling Black Colleges 'Pioneers' Of School Choice
thread.title_full: DeVos Slammed For Calling Black Colleges 'Pioneers' Of School Choice

author: Caitlin MacNeal
title: DeVos Slammed For Calling Black Colleges 'Pioneers' Of School Choice

organizations.name: devos slammed for calling black colleges 'pioneers' of school choice education

text:
Education Secretary Betsy DeVos on Monday night released a statement suggesting that historically black colleges were the product of a "school choice" movement, prompting swift backlash on Twitter and from Democratic lawmakers.
Read More â†’
